Whitespace

# Whitespace

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class                           | Support     |
| ------------------------------- | ----------- |
| ```
whitespace-normal
```       | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
whitespace-nowrap
```       | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
whitespace-pre
```          | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
whitespace-pre-line
```     | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
whitespace-pre-wrap
```     | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
whitespace-break-spaces
``` | 🌐 Web only |
